Description:
Al Amal Business Solutions is seeking a European Sales Executive to join a Luxury Fine Dining Restaurant in Abu Dhabi. The successful candidate will be responsible in overseeing all aspects of the sales process, including developing new business relationships and maintaining existing ones with high-end clients. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of sales success within the hospitality industry. This is an excellent opportunity to join a rapidly growing company in a key role.Identify and develop new business opportunities for the luxury restaurant in Abu Dhabi and its surrounding areas.
Maintain existing relationships with high-end clients, ensuring their continued satisfaction.
Develop and implement sales strategies to achieve revenue targets and growth objectives.
Meet with potential clients, highlighting the unique features and benefits of the restaurant.
Maintain up-to-date knowledge of industry trends, competitor activity, and market developments.
Collaborate with other departments, such as marketing and operations, to drive sales and ensure client satisfaction.
Provide regular sales reports to management, including sales figures, market analysis, and sales pipeline updates.Job Details
